ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.scaling

Class PID

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.scaling.PID

  • public class PID
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple Proportional–integral–derivative controller (PID controller. or three-term controller) is a control loop mechanism employing feedback See http://brettbeauregard.com/blog/2011/04/improving-the-beginner%E2%80%99s-pid-derivative-kick/
    Author:
    pschatzmann
